dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S680 PCS: To rescind amounts appropriated for fiscal year 2013 for the Department of Defense for the Medium Extended Air Defense System, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Ayotte (for herself and Mr. Begich) introduced the following bill; which was read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To rescind amounts appropriated for fiscal year 2013 for the Department of Defense for the Medium Extended Air Defense System, and for other purposes.

section.header: Rescission of amounts for fiscal year 2013 for the Department of Defense for the Medium Extended Air Defense System

subsection.text:
The amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title IV of division C of the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013 ( Public Law 113â€“6 ) under the heading
Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army for the Medium Extended Air Defense System (MEADS), namely $380,900,000, is hereby rescinded.

subsection.header: Increase in amount for Operation and Maintenance
subsection.text: The aggregate amount appropriated by title II of division C of the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013 is increased by $205,000,000, with the amount to be allocated among accounts funded by that title in a manner determined appropriate by the Secretary of Defense. The Secretary shall submit to Congress a report describing the allocation of funds among accounts pursuant to this subsection.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
